solver._mode_description: production: GPU + 3 core dicts, cpu_fallback: CPU + 3 core dicts, debug_single: single dict, debug_all: all 11 dicts

acceleration._force_gpu_off_description: Override GPU detection and force CPU-only processing
acceleration._enable_cuda_nltk_description: Use CUDA-accelerated NLTK proper noun detection when available
acceleration._gpu_batch_size_description: Number of words to process per GPU batch

dictionaries._force_single_dictionary_description: Override mode and use only this dictionary path (for debugging)
dictionaries._exclude_dictionaries_description: List of dictionary names to skip
dictionaries._include_only_dictionaries_description: If specified, only use these dictionaries (overrides mode)
dictionaries._download_timeout_description: Timeout in seconds for downloading remote dictionaries
dictionaries._cache_expiry_days_description: Days before re-downloading cached remote dictionaries

filtering._min_word_length_description: Minimum word length (NYT Spelling Bee requires 4+)
filtering._enable_nyt_rejection_filter_description: Filter out abbreviations and likely rejected words
filtering._confidence_threshold_description: Minimum confidence score to include word (0-100)
filtering._max_results_description: Maximum number of results to return (0 = unlimited)

output._minimal_stats_description: Show only essential performance stats (GPU on/off, time)
output._verbose_stats_description: Show detailed GPU and performance statistics

logging._log_filtering_steps_description: Log each filtering step with timing

debug._save_candidates_description: Save filtered candidates to file for analysis
debug._validate_results_description: Run additional validation checks on results
debug._benchmark_mode_description: Run multiple iterations and report average performance
